typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cur_code2 as string,
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> preDimCurrency
preDimCurrency derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Currencies') ~> DeriveTopLevel
DeriveTopLevel derive(hashedValues = sha1(cur_code,cur_description,curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd)) ~> DeriveHashed
DeriveHashed keyGenerate(output(dim_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		dim_key,
		top_code,
		top_description,
		cur_code,
		cur_description,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColumns
SelectOutputColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_currency.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrencyInsert
